featured.text: As a result, the astronauts have swollen, puffy faces, very much resembling that of the round-headed Charlie Brown in the famous comic strip.
At the Book Fair, exhibitors from 21 countries will _______ textbooks, novels, and comic books.
Dooley attempts to save the old man by a ritual learned from comic books: killing a turtle and trading his soul for Grandfather’s.

definition.zh_def: 漫畫；幽默的事物或情境
definition.en_def: A comic is a medium that uses images and text to tell a story, often humorous or satirical.
definition.example: She loves reading comic books in her free time.
